title: Ep 176: Bathtub Romance with Tia Williams
itunes:title: Ep 176: Bathtub Romance with Tia Williams
itunes:subtitle: Kate becomes one with nature in New Hampshire and Doree is just a few sales away from being a bestselling memoirist. Then, romance novelist and Editorial Director of Estee Lauder Companies Tia Williams joins the pod to talk about how she does (and does...
description:
Kate becomes one with nature in New Hampshire and Doree is just a few sales away from being a bestselling memoirist. Then, romance novelist and Editorial Director of Estee Lauder Companies Tia Williams joins the pod to talk about how she does (and doesn’t) balance working full-time with motherhood and a career in writing, why she writes main characters with hidden disabilities, and why she loves writing sex scenes. 


To leave a voicemail or text for a future episode, reach us at 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.

Visit forever35podcast.com for links to everything we mention on the show.

Follow us on Twitter (@Forever35Pod) and Instagram (@Forever35Podcast) and join the Forever35 Facebook Group (Password: Serums). 

Sign up for the newsletter! At forever35podcast.com/newsletter
